item.title: 投资者为何未将通胀纳入特朗普的美联储收购要约？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在美联储（Federal Reserve）的夺权行为给整个货币政策领域敲响了警钟--但在债券市场的一个角落，这些警钟却没有起到作用。【原文：President Donald Trump’s power grab at the Federal Reserve has sounded alarms across the monetary policy world – but not in one corner of the bond market where they might have made a difference.】

item.title: CVC 出售西班牙大学，私人信贷与银行对垒
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 可能出售西班牙私立大学阿方索十世萨比欧大学（Universidad Alfonso X El Sabio），这激起了私人信贷公司和银行承销多达 10 亿欧元债务的意愿。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc’s potential sale of Spanish private university Universidad Alfonso X El Sabio has stirred up offers to underwrite as much as €1 billion of debt from both private credit firms and banks.】

item.title: 2026 年瑞士经济增长将因美国关税而大幅放缓：KOF
item.description: 据苏黎世 KOF 研究所称，由于美国征收高额关税，瑞士明年的经济增长将大大低于预期。【原文：Switzerland’s economy will grow much less than expected next year due to the hefty tariffs imposed by the US, according to Zurich’s KOF research institute.】

item.title: 英国通胀为何如此之高及其对利率的影响
item.description: 尽管大流行病后爆发的通货膨胀在发达国家的大部分地区都有所缓解，但在西方主要经济体中，英国的物价增长速度仍然是最高的。【原文：While a post-pandemic burst of inflation has abated across much of the developed world, the UK is still stuck with the highest price growth among big Western economies.】

item.title: 外国投资者在北欧利基信贷中发现了丰富的投资机会
item.description: 在过去二十年的大部分时间里，欧洲最北端的国家在很大程度上被认为是企业债务领域的落后地区。最近，大量国际投资者的涌入开始打破这一形象。【原文：For much of the past two decades, Europe’s northernmost countries have largely been considered a backwater in the corporate debt world. A recent influx of international investors has started to chip away at that image.】

item.title: 凯德置地房地产投资信托基金正在商讨削减印度资产以获取现金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯德置地印度信托公司正在就向印度家族办公室 Viko Group 出售办公园区进行深入谈判，售价高达 1.4 亿美元，因为这家总部位于新加坡的公司正在缩减其在印度的投资组合。【原文：CapitaLand India Trust is in advanced talks to sell office parks to Viko Group, an Indian family office, for as much as $140 million, as the Singapore-based company trims its portfolio in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国从印尼进口的原油激增表明与伊朗有贸易往来
item.description: 在过去的两个月里，中国的印尼原油进口量激增，突出了一条不太可能的路线，这表明伊朗的石油出口可能会出现新的变通办法—；即使面对美国的压力也是如此。【原文：China has recorded a surge in Indonesian crude imports over the past two months, highlighting an unlikely route that suggests new workarounds could be emerging for Iran’s oil exports — even in the face of US pressure.】

item.title: 印尼国家银行上调美元存款利率，印尼盾下跌
item.description: 由于印尼盾再次面临压力，印尼最大的国有贷款机构将提高美元存款利率。【原文：Indonesia’s biggest state lenders will raise interest rates on dollar deposits as the nation sees renewed pressure on the rupiah.】

item.title: 德国商业前景自四月以来首次下滑
item.description: 德国企业信心意外下降，凸显了德国总理弗里德里希-默茨恢复欧洲最大经济体增长计划的脆弱性。【原文：German business confidence unexpectedly dropped, highlighting the fragility of Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s plan to restore growth in Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 匈牙利反驳特朗普停止购买俄罗斯石油的要求
item.description: 匈牙利外交部长彼得-齐雅尔托说，即使其盟友美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出要求，匈牙利也不会停止购买俄罗斯石油，理由是这个内陆国家的地理限制。【原文：Hungary won’t stop buying Russian oil even if requested to do so by its ally, US President Donald Trump, Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto said, citing the geographical constraints of the landlocked nation.】

item.title: 日本通胀目标倡导者伊藤隆敏逝世，享年 74 岁
item.description: 哥伦比亚大学教授伊藤隆敏（Takatoshi Ito）逝世，他将通货膨胀目标制引入日本，帮助引发了现代史上最激进的货币宽松实验之一。享年 74 岁。【原文：Takatoshi Ito, a Columbia University professor whose role in bringing inflation targeting to Japan helped trigger one of the most aggressive monetary easing experiments in modern history, has died. He was 74.】

item.title: 中国人民银行顾问带头呼吁财政援助支持房地产市场
item.description: 以中国央行顾问为首的一批学者认为，中国的财政措施应支持房地产业实现转型，他们敦促中国政府在调整经济结构的同时，扶持传统的增长动力，同时培育新兴产业。【原文：China’s fiscal measures should support the property sector through a transformation, according to a group of academics led by an adviser to the country’s central bank, who urged Beijing to assist a traditional growth driver while fostering new industries as it restructures the economy.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴在其人工智能平台中整合英伟达机器人软件
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司正在将英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）用于所谓物理人工智能（physical AI）的人工智能开发工具套件整合到其云软件平台中。【原文：Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd. is integrating Nvidia Corp.’s suite of artificial intelligence development tools for so-called physical AI into its cloud software platform.】

item.title: 贸易谈判重启，印度贸易部长寻求更多美国能源
item.description: 印度商务部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）表示，印度希望增加从美国购买石油和天然气，同时努力说服华盛顿降低印度出口产品的关税并达成贸易协议。【原文：India wants to increase purchase of oil and gas from the US, Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal said, amid efforts to persuade Washington to lower tariff on country’s exports and secure a trade deal.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯股市因押注所有权限制将被取消而飙升
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的基准股指大涨，原因是人们猜测，如果取消对外国人拥有上市公司多数股权的限制，沙特将从数十亿美元的投资中获益。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s benchmark stock index surged on speculation the kingdom will benefit from billions of dollars of investment if limits on foreigners owning majority stakes in public companies are lifted.】

item.title: 无人机在俄罗斯萨拉瓦特石化厂引发火灾
item.description: 无人机袭击导致俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）位于俄罗斯巴什科尔托斯坦地区的 Neftekhim Salavat 石油化工厂发生火灾，这是该工厂在不到一周的时间内遭受的第二次袭击。【原文：A drone attack caused a fire at Gazprom PJSC’s Neftekhim Salavat petrochemical plant in Russia’s Bashkortostan region, the second assault on the facility in less than a week.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划增税以缓解战争对预算造成的压力
item.description: 由于乌克兰战争继续对预算造成压力，俄罗斯计划提高消费税并扩大需缴纳消费税的公司范围，以帮助填补不断扩大的财政缺口。【原文：Russia plans to raise its consumption tax and broaden the base of companies required to pay it to help plug a widening fiscal gap as the war on Ukraine continues to weigh on the budget.】

item.title: 阿波罗通过新的私人资本基金瞄准欧洲富豪
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is rolling out three new private capital funds for wealthy individual investors in Europe, intensifying the competition for a group seen as key to the growth of private markets.】

item.title: 丹麦央行在诺和诺德陷入困境和美国加征关税之际下调业绩展望
item.description: 由于制药巨头诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）面临的挑战和美国关税对斯堪的纳维亚经济造成的压力，丹麦央行下调了经济增长前景。【原文：Denmark’s central bank cut its growth outlook as challenges at drug giant Novo Nordisk A/S and US tariffs weigh on the Scandinavian economy.】

item.title: 金梅尔抨击联邦通信委员会卡尔放弃言论自由原则
item.description: 吉米-金梅尔重返电视荧屏的主要目标之一是联邦通信委员会主席布兰登-卡尔，这位深夜节目主持人指责他放弃言论自由原则，"令人尴尬"。【原文：One of Jimmy Kimmel’s main targets during his return to TV was Federal Communications Commission Chairman Brendan Carr, whom the late-night host accused of abandoning free-speech principles and being “embarrassing.”】

item.title: 梅赛德斯撤换技术主管，晋升首席执行官阿利
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）正在更换首席技术官马库斯-舍费尔（Markus Schäfer），这家德国豪华汽车制造商正准备进一步削减成本。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG is replacing its chief technology officer Markus Schäfer as the German luxury-car maker prepares for additional cost cuts.】

item.title: 格里尔称美国将在数周或数月内敲定东盟贸易协定
item.description: 美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）表示，华盛顿预计将在几周内与一些东南亚国家敲定贸易协议。【原文：Washington expects to finalize trade deals with some Southeast Asian countries within weeks, according to US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer.】

item.title: 巧克力湖寻求以高达 8 亿美元的估值出售股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，约旦巧克力湖公司正在与潜在买家商谈出售战略股份事宜，这将是约旦王国近年来最大的并购交易之一。【原文：Jordanian firm Chocolate Lake Co. is in talks with potential buyers about selling a strategic stake, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be one of the kingdom’s largest M&A transactions in recent years.】

item.title: 印度汽车股因莫迪的税收优惠政策而大涨
item.description: 本月，印度汽车股以一年多来最大的涨幅跑赢亚洲同行，分析师预计，随着减税措施刺激需求，印度汽车股的涨势将加快。【原文：Indian auto stocks are beating their Asian peers this month by the widest margin in over a year, and analysts expect the gains to accelerate as tax cuts boost demand.】

item.title: 高市称日本央行应决定政策步骤，立场有所缓和
item.description: 一位竞争执政党自民党党魁的热门候选人试图与一年前的鸽派言论保持距离，称日本央行应决定货币政策的具体细节。【原文：A top contender vying to lead the ruling Liberal Democratic Party sought to distance herself from dovish remarks made a year ago, saying the Bank of Japan should decide the particulars of monetary policy.】

item.title: 美团支持的人工智能机器人公司 Mech-Mind 据称计划在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Mech-Mind Robotics Technologies 公司正计划在香港进行首次公开募股，以筹集约 2 亿美元资金。【原文：Mech-Mind Robotics Technologies is planning an initial public offering in Hong Kong to raise about $200 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑下跌，英国股市将下跌
澳元兑基元汇率扩大领先优势，创三年新高，因对澳大利亚央行（RBA）充满信心
item.description: 澳元兑新西兰元汇率攀升至三年来的新高，此前澳大利亚通胀加速导致交易商减少了对该国降息的押注。【原文：The Australian dollar climbed to a fresh three-year high versus its New Zealand peer after Australia’s quickening inflation led traders to pare bets on interest-rate cuts in the nation.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的 Dhoot Transmission 据称将为 2.5 亿美元的首次公开募股指定银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Dhoot Transmission Ltd. 已指定四家银行安排其在孟买的首次公开募股。【原文：Dhoot Transmission Ltd. has appointed four banks to arrange its initial public offering in Mumbai, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长西波罗内称通胀风险 "非常均衡
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆认为，由于目前利率定位良好，通胀在两个方向上都不会受到重大威胁。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone doesn’t see major threats to inflation in either direction, with interest rates currently well positioned.】
